sub_topic: Probability of a certain weather event occurring
message_1: According to the weather forecast, there is a 60% chance that it will rain tomorrow. What is the probability that it will not rain tomorrow?
message_2: The probability that it will not rain tomorrow is the complement of the probability that it will rain. Since there is a 60% chance that it will rain, the probability that it will not rain is 100% - 60% = 40%.
